pullRequest.title: Form Recognizer builder clients
pullRequest.bodyText:
Remove getTrainingClient() from FormRecognizer clients.
Add getFormRecognizerAsyncClient() to FormTraining clients.
Add FormTrainingClientBuilder to independently build sync and async training clients.

nodes.bodyText:
Nit: The order feels off.

Add getFormRecognizerClient() and getFormRecognizerAsyncClient() in FormTrainingClient and FormTrainingAsyncClient
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,7 +1,8 @@
 # Release History
 
 ## 1.0.0-beta.3 (Unreleased)
-
+- Add `getFormRecognizerClient()` and `getFormRecognizerAsyncClient()` in FormTrainingAsyncClient and FormTrainingClient

nodes.bodyText:
Fix javadoc

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * @see FormRecognizerClientBuilder
          
          
            
             * @see FormTrainingClientBuilder
Make both sync and async clients final.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -58,7 +59,7 @@
  * @see FormRecognizerClientBuilder
  * @see FormRecognizerAsyncClient
  */
-@ServiceClient(builder = FormRecognizerClientBuilder.class, isAsync = true)
+@ServiceClient(builder = FormTrainingClientBuilder.class, isAsync = true)
 public class FormTrainingAsyncClient {

nodes.bodyText: Is this API necessary? The user can just build using the FormRecognizerClientBuilder directly.

Fix this in all the methods of the builder.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @return The updated FormRecognizerClientBuilder object.
          
          
            
                 * @return The updated FormTrainingClientBuilder object.
